Articles.Content: Is there a list of mods that are .22 compatible AND compatible with the science?
FASA is, as for the rest its a big list... Most mods work between versions even if they dont incorporate the new tech tree.

The FusTek Station Parts Expansion add-on is a rather peculiar case:

- The latest "official" version (R0.03.5a) is for sandbox only

- The development version (X0.04-1) comes with career mode integration

On the other hand, the SDHI Service Module System is fully career mode-ready.
